item.description:
Daniel Radcliffe has announced that he is an Atheist; surely this is a good reason to look past the superstitious elements of the woefully imaginative Harry Potter series, and enjoy an evening at the cinema.

It's unlikely that we'll be ably to sit together...

Please purchase your ticket before you RSVP "yes;" I'd like much to avoid any scenario in which members arrive at the cinema to find that they won't be able to enter.

Keep in mind that the movie will be letting out after the last trains have left Park Street; make travel plans accordingly in advance. Perhaps carpooling can be arranged through the mailing list...

Boston Atheism Examiner Jackie Lavache has a post on Radcliffe's newly public apostasy, at http://www.examiner.c....
item.name: Midnight Screening of Irrational Harry Potter Movie
